data.event: State health officials in Kenya issued an alert Thursday after an outbreak of cholera killed over 60 people in the last five months.

event.title: killed over 60 people in the last five months

data.event: State health officials in Kenya issued an alert Thursday after an outbreak of cholera killed over 60 people in the last five months.

event.title: Thursday in Nairobi, Director of Medical Service Dr. James Nyikal said

data.event: In a news conference Thursday in Nairobi, Director of Medical Service Dr. James Nyikal said that if urgent measures were not undertaken to control the outbreak, it could become much worse.
